titleStmt.title: Waters of Marah drawn forth in two funerall sermons, October 1653 and since (upon desire) enlarged / by Henry Hibbert ...
titleStmt.author: Hibbert, Henry, 1601 or 2-1678.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Hunt, and are to be sold by Francis Coles ... and by John Awdley ...,

notesStmt.note: The sermons are about the two children of W. Lyme.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
